page.title: 18LIVERY STABLES,CARDINGTON
page.content:
I have lived in the parish all my life and have run the livery stables single-handed for 7 years. A typical working day with 6 horses is:- 5.45am feed,water and muck out. 7.30am breakfast. 8am-1pm ride out horses,water and feed. 3pm groom horses and set stables right for night. 6pm feed and water. I was appointed joint Master of the South Shrops. Hunt in 1984.
Cost of Hunting: 1 horse Â£1,800.00 Livery per week 40.00 Field money per Meet 5.00 Sub. for season 175.00 Shoeing every 6 wks. 16.00 Vet.bills approx.1yr. 120.00
